segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, and she doesn't even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being really patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that the woman isn't paying attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in chaos, and she's just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get into trouble when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of tension, it's almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
